text: Nicolás Antonio Castellanos Franco (18 February 1935 – 19 February 2025) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate and missionary. He was bishop of Palencia from 1978 to 1991. He was born in Mansilla del Páramo, Spain. Castellanos died on 19 February 2025 in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia, one day after his 90th birthday.Fallece Mons. Nicolás Castellanos Franco, obispo emérito de Palencia ==References== ==Other websites== * Bishop Nicolás Antonio Castellanos Franco on Catholic-Hierarchy.org Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops
